description:
Imagine if you could find the "fountain of youth" and experience boundless energy, vitality and newly discovered health. Think about how you would FEEL if you could shake off chronic illnesses for good and step into a brand new body.

**********************************************************************************

UPDATED: June 18th, 2015

Five Star Ratings * * * * * 250 Students Enrolled in the First 24 Hours! Over 500+ Happy Students!

**********************************************************************************

If you are looking for boundless energy, health, quick weight loss, increased nutrition and inner healing, then the Ultimate Juicing Formula course will give you exactly that. This is a simple and easy-to-follow, step-by-step guide to starting with juicing and creating your personal health and vitality formula.

Do yourself a huge favour and move your health forward by stepping into a better you.

What is the course about?

Juicing doesn't have to be hard. This course gives you a solid understanding of juicing and how you can make it fun, easy, and simple so it will become a beneficial part of your life without feeling like a chore.

How long will the course take to complete?

The content of this course is very condensed and crafted for maximum value. The core lectures span around 1 hour and the bonus audio interviews are a total of 45 minutes. Give yourself a bit extra time for reading the extras.

I have been personally juicing for years and have seen the amazing results and benefits it can give you. I wanted to create a no-fluff, high-value course so you can bet that's what you'll be getting.

By the end of the course you will:

    ·Have a solid understanding of the basics of juicing, what juicing is, how to do it, and the different types of juicing

    ·Understand the top benefits of juicing and how it can radically transform your health and your life

    ·Know how to slow down, stop and even reverse chronic health illnesses

    ·Have selected your perfect juicer to fit your needs

    ·Have a number of delicious juicing recipes to get you started

    ·Be able to choose foods from the 7 colours that fit your health needs

    ·Be able to successfully integrate the juicing habit into your life

    ·Learn how to choose your produce for maximum nutrition and shelf life

    ·Learn how to minimize your juicing time and fit it into your busy schedule

***********************

This course is for you if:

- you're lacking energy, vitality and want to overcome any chronic illnesses - You want to lose weight the natural way - You've tried juicing before but found it challenging to fit it into your busy schedule or stick to the habit

This course is not for you if:

- You're looking for a quick-fix, magic-pill, overnight-success solution. - If you're already an experienced juicer

Here are what some people say about their juicing experiences:

"Overall, the juice fast helped me a lot. I lost around 13 kilograms permanently, my waist got 10 centimeters slimmer, and most importantly I beat the insulin resistance and fatty liver syndrome as a result. I look much younger than the days before juicing, and feel more energetic."

-- Cenk K.

"I have more energy and feel a lot happier in myself. Oh, and I have lost 21 lbs, started at 205 lbs and today I am 184 lbs."

-- Roxanne S.

"Before I started juicing, if we went to a restaurant, a meal would consist of an appetizer, entrée and dessert. Four years later my fiancé and I split an entrée and were full."

-- Lloyd B.

"During my 7-day juice cleanse, I lost ten pounds, so I decided to continue it for thirty more days and I lost thirty pounds. It's almost like a pound a day!"

-- Tasha M.

********************

As I value my students, I have included some valuable bonuses as well.

Bonuses Included:

Along with the core modules, you get the following:

*Bonus 1* 2 Juicing Expert Audio Interviews (45 min) & PDF transcripts

*Bonus 2* PDF Recipe Booklet with over X recipes

*Bonus 3* Q/A Module with the most asked questions (updated regularly)

*Bonus 4* PDF Juicing Resource List for you to continue after this course

*Bonus 5* PDF of all slides for quick review of the course

*Bonus 6* Free Updates for Life & Ongoing Support

******************

Take this course and transform your health to the next level. It could be months or even years before you have the opportunity to take action on this and change your life and your health for the better. How long do you want to keep suffering from poor health and lack of energy?

Click on "Enroll in this Course" now to get started right away and I look forward to seeing you on the other side!
title: Ultimate Juicing Formula: Nutrition, Weight Loss, & Health
